author: Staff Reporter
text:
Selvarani (45) of Rajavoor near Nagercoil blocked the road in front of the Collectorate demanding “justice” for the alleged murder of her two relatives Magesh and Ramesh on the night of August 30. She alleged that the relatives were beaten to death by an unidentified gang, but police registered a case of an accident.

The woman demanded that the case be altered as murder and transferred to CBCID to bring out truth.

When the Collector’s car came out of the complex, the woman tried to block his car, however it was thwarted by the alert women police personnel. Later, the woman was pacified and sent home.
title: Woman blocks road
